title: Women of Inspiration - Holiday Celebration
desc: On   December 8, the   will present? ?at the PlayStation Theater in NYC to honor 3 women who have achieved leadership positions in sports business while serving as role models and mentors for other women.?The inaugural honorees are making an impact and leading from within to empower us all to reach for higher heights. This year-end holiday celebration will feature a sports fashion runway show, live DJ, and plenty of good cheer while networking with some of the industry?s best and brightest stars and special guests! The evening will also include   to the five?women who met for breakfast in 1993 to brainstorm a way to bring women in sports business together; 23 years later WISE is a national organization with chapters throughout the United States in 12 cities/regions from coast-to-coast. ?   ,  , Pole Position Raceway   ,  , Brooklyn Nets/Barclays Center   ,  , CBS Sports ? ?
